item.title: Version 1.0.8
item.description:
üìÖ Major Update: Academic Periods

‚ú® New Features

  • Academic Schedule System: You can now configure School Years, Semesters, and Rounds in Settings > Configuration.
  • Global Time Filtering: Added a new scope selector (Calendar Icon). Switch your entire app view between "All Time", specific Semesters, or individual Rounds to filter History and Analytics data instantly.

üõ°Ô∏è Logic & Validation

  • Smart Date Pickers: When configuring schedules, date pickers are now strictly constrained. A Semester cannot be set outside its Year, and a Round cannot be set outside its Semester.
  • Auto-Refresh: Lists and configurations now update immediately upon saving, removing the need to navigate back and forth.
  • Strict Hierarchy: Added robust validation to prevent overlapping dates between Semesters and Rounds.
  • Auto-Sync: The app now automatically detects and applies the active academic year immediately after configuration.
  • Crash Fixes: Resolved list immutability errors when adding rounds to new semesters.

üìä Analytics

  • Scoped Data: The Analytics Dashboard now respects the selected Academic Period, allowing you to see teacher performance for a specific term or round.

üîç UX Improvements

  • Scope Selector: Improved the "Select Academic Period" dialog with a visual tree structure and "Active Now" indicators.
  • Safety: Added confirmation dialogs when deleting Semesters to prevent accidental data loss.

‚ú® Academic Schedule Redesign

  • Timeline Dashboard: Completely revamped the schedule view into a card-based visual timeline.
  • Smart Editor: New "Master-Detail" editor with visual connectors for Semesters and Rounds.
  • Pill UI: Date pickers and status indicators now use a modern, touch-friendly "Pill" design.
